title: TOWIE's James Lock heads on boys' night out after kissing Ellie Mackenzie on date
text:
He split from his girlfriend of three years Yazmin Oukhellou earlier this summer and they are currently embroiled in the bitter aftermath of the break-up.

But amid the drama, TOWIE's James Lock attempted to forget his woes as he headed on a lads' night out with his close pals Dan Edgar and Pete Wicks on Sunday.

Their outing comes after he was pictured having a smooch with his rumoured girlfriend Ellie Mackenzie, outside Hakkasan restaurant in London on Saturday.

Boys night: TOWIE's James Lock attempted to forget his woes as he headed on a lads' night out with his close pals Dan Edgar and Pete Wicks on Sunday

James Lock was spotted arriving at STK restaurant wearing his signature form-fitting black T-shirt underneath a stylish leather jacket with zip detailing.

He teamed the jacket with a pair of very tight distressed dark denim jeans and a pair of black lace-up shoes, showcasing his surgically-enhanced features by wearing his hair swept back off his face.

Just hours earlier in pictures obtained by the Sun, James was spotted passionately kissing Ellie outside the club while she wrapped her arms around him.

New girl? Their outing comes after he was pictured having a smooch with his rumoured girlfriend Ellie Mackenzie outside Hakkasan restaurant in London on Saturday

Yazmin and James ended their nearly three-year relationship earlier in summer, after she accused him of cheating on her while they were on holiday in Turkey.

Yazmin previously spoke about the betrayal with The Sun: 'Whether he did cheat or not our relationship died that night, I was on the floor being sick and crying my heart out and he still didn't come home until 12pm the next day.

'My gut says he cheated, I don't know why he wouldn't come back if he hadn't he was thinking of his lies, I had all his things packed for him waiting at the door.

'He would never admit it, I could catch him with his pants down and he would deny it, I don't know if he will ever be happy.'

Dapper: James Lock was spotted arriving at STK restaurant wearing his signature form-fitting black T-shirt underneath a stylish leather jacket with zip detailing

Steamy: Just hours earlier in pictures obtained by the Sun , James was spotted passionately kissing Ellie outside the club while she wrapped her arms around him

It has been claimed that Yaz had been briefly dating Lauren Goodger's jailbird ex Jake McLean.

Yazmin's representative told MailOnline: 'It has been reported in the press today that following her break-up with James Lock two months ago, our client Yazmin Oukhellou is now dating Jake McLean.

'In order to clarify the facts on all related stories to this, Yazmin has decided to confirm that she is not dating this individual.

Cheeky chappy: James was joined at the event by Dan who rocked a stylish Balenciaga T-shirt

Cool guy: Meanwhile, Pete rocked a light wash denim jacket with a pair of black jeans

'Being an always honest and genuine person however, Yazmin validates that the pair have been on a couple of dates, but things seem to have fizzled out.

'Yazmin maintains firmly that her relationship status is single, and continues to focus on her upcoming work commitments.'

Yazmin recently confessed she is struggling with her split from James due to their close proximity on the cast trip to Marbella.

Speaking exclusively to MailOnline, the businesswoman confessed the break-up has been akin to a divorce due to the fact the couple have a series of businesses together and are being forced to divide their joint assets.

Hanging out: The two men were pictured having a chat outside the event

Happy! Dan beamed from ear-to-ear as he made the most of his night out with the lads

Sources revealed their trip has been thwarted by a series of arguments between the exes.

After painstaking scenes in the current series, in which the couple have locked horns when Yazmin professed to James that she was 'in love with herself', the former couple have now joined their co-stars in heading to Mallorca for filming.

It seems things have grown increasingly tense during the holiday as she revealed the battles she has gone through and how their split has been tough.

Accessories: Pete styled up his casual look with a pale grey trilby hat

Chatting: Pete stood outside in the smoking area with a blonde female companion

Between their fitness retreat and events company, she admitted they are struggling with the split - yet she insisted she should get all their assets.

She explained the painstaking process, saying: 'We have two businesses together which we need to sort out. It's like a divorce...

'I was thinking of keeping the fitness retreat and giving him the events company but I think he should give them both back to me to be honest because I set them up. I will give him a job. He could be a waiter...

Over for good! Yazmin (pictured) and James ended their nearly three-year relationship earlier in summer, after she accused him of cheating on her while they were on holiday in Turkey

'We have been in contact because of the businesses but it isn’t healthy for us. We need to cut all ties and move on...

'I set up businesses with him to try keep him on track. I wasn't trying to fix him but I do feel like he is a lost soul.

'I wasn't trying to fix him but I was always trying to help him. There will always be a part of me who loves him.'

Yazmin insists she ended up having to 'mother' James throughout their relationship, which put a strain on things.

She said: 'I feel like I have mothered him. I would wash and clean and cook for him. I still have a love for him and I still care for him. When he's on his own he can go off track, so I still worry about him...

'Yaz is back but you get to see a new Yaz. I'm a lot more calm, collected and powerful. There's a lot of young female viewers and I want to set a better example...

'I am enjoying being able to do what I want when I want. I love being independent. I miss him and being in a relationship but it was definitely the right decision...

'I've just set up a ladies boutique with my mum which will celebrate women and women of different sizes.'
description: TOWIE's James Lock attempted to forget his woes as he headed on a lads' night out with his close pals Dan Edgar and Pete Wicks on Sunday.
